history.text: Hello
Hello
The movie received a 98% on Rotten Tomatoes
Have you seen this movie?
What about you?
No, but I think Craig Ferguson is funny. I would like to see the exhilarating 3-D animation.
Craig Ferguson stars as Gobber the Belch.

This movie does have a 98% score on rotten tomatoes. It has a slightly less impressive score on Metacritic. I think it would still be very good. Do usually watch movies with this type of critical score?
Are you still there?
I would try to find movies with great ratings and sounds interesting.
I have not seen many animated movies lately. Do you watch movies in this genre often?
In scene 1 the setting takes place in The Isle of Berk village.
Hiccup is the name of the young kid. I think that is a strange name for a character.
Yes. That is a strange name. I like that he uses the mechanical devices to overcome his small stature
But he actually thought he shot down one of those beasts.
I also think he seems very kind as he does not kill the dragon.
Hiccup actually saves the injured flying beast in scene 2.
What do you think of that?
I think that’s very sweet of him. I am glad to see that he underestimated himself and that he is able to claim and ride the Dragon.
I thought he was fighting against them? Why would Hiccup saved one?
Plot of the story?
I think he sees that the dragons are not complete beasts. What do you think?
After all he's been fighting them at age 15.
Maybe he is just using that as a strategy.
True.
I think he was desensitized and tricked by these evil creatures. I think he's falling into their trap.
I don’t think all of them are evil. One of them tried to protect him
Scene 3 Hiccups show the creature to his father.
I am sad that Hiccup lost his leg, but I think that it is very nice that they are now able to live in harmony.
I am also happy that he was able to save the dragon.
That creature knows the direction to the nest. I like how Hiccup is using that creature to trick and show them the way to destroy them all.
I think the dragons are nice. Most of them anyway.
I don't really like this movie.

uid1response.feedback: The other user was kind of negative
